title: Interpretation of a dream about attachment in a dream in different situations

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams is that you stumble in a dream on different occasions, if you go on a trip and enjoy climbing mountains and in a sudden moment your foot slips and you are about to fall, God forbid, but God Almighty wants your foot to stumble. On a rock, or you can hold someone's hand with you, or there is a rope that prevents you from falling, all of these are called attachment and seeing attachment in a dream is definitely a sign of something, so learn about the interpretation of attachment in a dream through this article in the encyclopedia.Interpretation of seeing attachment In a dream: Clinging to a dream can be one of the most disturbing nightmares for the dreamer because he feels fear and anxiety in his dream. Anyone can see in his dream that he is holding on to a wall, a person’s hand, or a rope, and this situation continues until he survives or falls, and most likely this vision shows that the owner is always trying to fix himself or make something in his life, but he does not reach a result that satisfies him, Which causes him stress, anxiety, and fear, and that is why he sees such a vision. Interpretation of the appearance of attachment in a dream by Ibn Sirin: Ibn Sirin believes that the presence of a person hanging or hanging in a dream from a high place such as a mountain or a building, then he was unable to catch up with him and fell to the ground. This vision can predict disappointment in people whom the dreamer trusts, as they will take actions that the dreamer did not think would come from them. Interpretation of the appearance of attachment in a dream according to Al-Nabulsi: Al-Nabulsi agrees with Ibn Sirin’s opinion and says: Whoever sees that he is hanging or hanging from a high place and does not fall It is a sign that he is a person who has many good qualities, such as faith and piety toward God. If it falls after stopping, it is a sign of the fall of the people who were trusted by the fortuneteller. One hanging in an area filled with mud is a warning sign of his lack of religion and morals. Interpretation of seeing a rope in a dream: If the dreamer finds in a dream that he is tied with a rope, and that the rope is hanging from the sky, then it is a sign of his adherence to the Qur’an and Sunnah, and if the dreamer is raised. With the rope tied to him in a dream in the sky, it may be a sign of his death, but if he finds that the rope is cut or cannot be caught If the rope is tied around the viewer’s shoulder or neck, then it is a sign that he will get married, enter into a contract, or pay off a debt if he owes it. Religion. Whoever sees in his dream that he is hanging from a rope tied to a tree, it is a sign of witchcraft and corruption. Whoever succeeds in his dream in climbing the rope attached to him is a sign that he will triumph over his enemies and defeat them, God willing. And seeing the connection from foot to rope to people below is a sign of engaging in Work that greatly satisfies the viewer. Interpretation of hanging in a dream for an unmarried woman: If an unmarried woman sees herself hanging with a tied rope, this is good news about her marriage or engagement soon. If an unmarried woman sees herself hanging from someone’s hand, this means that She has a love relationship with this person. As for seeing her holding on to something to prevent herself from falling, this shows her patience and struggle to reach what she wants, and it is also seen as a sign of her anxiety about losing what she has achieved. Interpretation of attachment in a dream for a married woman

Interpretation of attachment in a dream for a married woman

title: Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to the Dream Interpretation website. The topic of our article dealt with the interpretation of seeing coal in a dream according to what was stated in the book Interpretation of Dreams by the great translator Muhammad Ibn Sirin. Where we discover together the total signs that coal, ash, and cannon symbolize in the vision. Coal was mentioned in the famous work “The Great Interpretation of Dreams” in Chapter Forty-Two under the title “In the vision of fire and its tools, such as curtains, wood, coal, ovens, candles, lamps, candles, lanterns, and what?” Related to this. “Interpretation of seeing coal in a dream: Ibn Sirin says: Coal is from trees, and in the interpretation it is a dangerous man, and he adds: Coal is forbidden for money, and it is a provision from the Lord. Unused coal looks like ash, so it is frowned upon, false, or hated. As for the coal used in fuel, it indicates the multiplicity of voices a person has in his work because of its benefit. It is said that Saif bin Di Yazan (516 AD - 574 AD) saw in his sleep a fire that came down from the sky over the land of Aden, fell on every one of its houses, and was extinguished. Until it became coal. . . When he narrated that vision of crossing his kingdom, they answered him: Abyssinia occupies his land and his kingdom, so it happened after a while. Ashes in a dreamIt is mentioned in Ibn Sirin’s interpretation that ashes are forbidden, and in the interpretation there is a suspicious livelihood that the dreamer takes from the ruler, and he is tired as a result of the Sultan and his entourage. It was also said: Ash is knowledge that has no benefit, or it is a false statement and slander. Whoever sees in his dream as if he is lighting an oven or lighting a fire in his house, he will benefit from his money or his children. Ibn Sirin says in the interpretation of ashes: Whoever blows an oven without ashes will marry a woman. It is not suitable for her. Kanon in a dream. As for the iron base in a dream, it expresses a noble, noble woman with strength, prowess, money, and judgment. If the base is made of wood, it indicates hypocrisy, flattery and evasiveness on the part of the dreamer’s people. The gypsum base indicates the greatness of lineage, and the clay or utensils indicate piety, obedience, and dignity for the wife and children. The base that appears in the dream contains fire, indicates power and influence, and expresses the state, the emirate, rule, prestige, and authority. The base that appears in the dream without fire indicates failure. Defeat and unemployment are an indication of poverty, need and distress.

title: Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of suicide by Ibn Sirin in a dream, when we talk about suicide we are talking about one of the behaviors and attitudes that have a great impact on people and societies, and also just thinking about it was one of the negative effects that he had control over and it is the reason why Islam forbade suicide and made it great among adults, so it led Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s suicide vision has different interpretations according to interpretation scholars. Interpretation of suicide in a dream by Ibn Sirin. In fact, suicide is one of the actions carried out by some people with weak faith, which is doing several ways to end their lives, through it. Therefore, the interpretation of seeing suicide in a dream carries with it interpretations. And perhaps a warning. To insight: In general, the interpretation of seeing suicide in a dream indicates failure to achieve various dreams and achievements in a person’s life. On the other hand, seeing a poor person committing suicide in a dream indicates the upcoming sustenance in the dreamer’s life. But if you see a rich person committing suicide, this is evidence of loss, poverty, and failure in Field of workTherefore, seeing a relative or loved one commit suicide is a sign of increasing the bonds of love and strengthening the intertwined relationships between them. See also: Interpretation of a dream of entering a stranger’s house in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a suicide vision by Ibn Sirin. Dream of the death of a suicidal person. It should be noted that seeing a person committing suicide in a dream, or dreaming of a person committing suicide. And he dies. It is considered one of the most terrifying dreams that is accompanied by anxiety, fear, and panic for the dreamer. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s vision of suicide indicates failure to achieve goals: Also, seeing a group of people committing suicide in a dream is a sign of illness, epidemic, or disasters that will occur in life, but if someone sees in his dream that he is killing himself, this is a sign that he will be exposed to problems and misfortunes, and with However, they fade and disappear with the passage of time. Therefore, suicide in a dream indicates the extreme poverty and fatigue that the dreamer suffers from. Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees that she committed suicide and did not die, this is evidence of the imminence of her marriage. See also: Interpretation of the roof of Ibn Sirin or Ibn Shaheen in detail. A relative commits suicide in a dreamIn reality, dreams are sometimes related to the reality in which a person lives, in addition to the fact that dreams are an interpretation of events that exist or will occur. Therefore, Ibn Sirin’s interpretation of the suicidal vision carries with it a set of interpretations that came as follows: Therefore, if a relative is imprisoned and sees in a dream that he is killing himself, this is good news from God that he will release him. But if a close friend sees himself committing suicide, this is a sign On the betrayal and deception that the dreamer is exposed to by his friend. Also, if someone close to you sees himself killing himself and indulging in it, this is a sign of the abundance of health and luxury that they enjoy. Likewise, seeing a relative committing suicide is a sign of the good that will come to one’s life if he dies. In a dream. See also: Interpretation of dreams of seeing chickpeas for single and married people by Ibn Sirin. Seeing a stranger committing suicide in a dream. Therefore, when a person sees in a dream

title: What you do not know about the interpretation and interpretation of the presence of glass in a dream

preview.html: Seeing glass in a dream and its interpretations. Glass in a dream explains psychological pressures, life crises, financial problems, and other issues that a person is exposed to in his day. The dream is good for the dreamer. Seeing glass in a dream. Glass in a dream indicates a lady or woman, and if it is beautiful and clean in the dream, this indicates On success, abundant luck, food, and kindness for the dreamer. Seeing glass also indicates fears and problems that the dreamer may face during his life, but they will quickly go away and end. Seeing glass falling from a man’s hand and breaking is a sign of problems and disagreements that will arise between the man and his wife and lead to divorce and separation. Seeing A married woman's broken glass in her dream is evidence of the problems, anxiety, and disagreements that she will face in her married life. Seeing the dreamer take the cup out of his mouth and throw it away is good for him, as the vision expresses getting rid of problems and worries and improving the dreamer's circumstances for the better. A dream of broken glass shows broken glass in the dream The disappointments that the dreamer experiences in his life may indicate problems and disagreements between family, relatives or friends. An unmarried girl seeing broken glass in her dream indicates that the girl is exposed to an emotional crisis that led to her internal feeling of brokenness and disappointment. A girl’s dream of broken glass is a sign of Failure at work or study, as well as a warning of the problems and fears that the girl will face in the coming period of her life. What is the interpretation of a dream about pulling a glass from a man? If one sees a glass in a dream, and it breaks in his leg, then this vision indicates that the dreamer will face financial crises in the future. The next period of his life. But if the glass enters the dreamer’s feet in the dream, this is a sign that the dreamer will be affected by the past and memories, which will affect his present and future. By seeing himself pulling the glass from his feet, this is a sign that the dreamer is trying to get rid of the memories that surrounded him in the present and past. He is trying to get rid of his past and his pain. Glass Dream Interpretation: Seeing broken glass in a dream and trying to repair it again is beneficial for the pioneer, whether male or female, married or divorced, as repairing broken glass indicates improving conditions, resolving crises, and getting rid of problems and fears. Whoever sees glass in a dream and eats it, this indicates problems. The worries that the dreamer is exposed to and that he will be exposed to extreme sadness and distress. The glass door in a dream The glass door in a dream is evidence of failure in work, abandonment, or loss. Seeing a glass door does not benefit its owner, as it indicates the loss of something and its abandonment, and God knows best. To interpret your dream accurately and quickly, there is an Egyptian Google website that specializes in interpreting dreams. Broken glass in a dream Broken glass in a dream indicates psychological pressures and life pressures to which the dreamer is exposed, or may It is evidence that the dreamer is exposed to problems, crises, and disagreements between the dreamer and those around him. The glass in the dream can be good for the dreamer, but breaking the glass is evidence of loss and failure on the general level.

title: What is the interpretation of seeing a pin in a dream and what does it indicate?

preview.html: What is the interpretation of seeing a pin in a dream and what does it indicate? Seeing pins in a dream can indicate a vision that is not very promising in many cases. It can indicate enemies, anxiety, sadness, and many troubles and problems, because it indicates deception. A man who sees a pin in his dream harms him, and this indicates the presence of a disreputable woman in his life. If one sees that the pin has cut off his hands, it means that the dreamer will suffer from humiliation or injustice from those around him. Follow us to learn the most important interpretation of seeing a brooch in a dream and what it indicates. Interpretation of seeing a brooch for a single woman. Many dream interpreters say that a brooch in a girl’s dream indicates the approach of her marriage. A girl’s brooch can indicate a deceitful person who is manipulating her feelings. Try to hurt her and be careful of that. Seeing her holding a pin indicates that her engagement is approaching. If the dreamer sees a group of pins in his hand, this vision indicates that he will have a homely atmosphere and family warmth. Removing a pin from clothes can indicate many omens. In a dream, it may indicate the dreamer’s success in getting rid of troubles and problems. If a girl sees in her dream that she is removing a pin, this means that she will get rid of crises and problems. It also suggests getting rid of a failed and exhausting love relationship. Seeing yourself putting a pin in a dream indicates that there is An evil and cunning person in her life. If a girl sees that someone pierced her with a pin and feels pain, this indicates the presence of evil people in her life. Seeing pins for single people indicates a happy marriage in the near future. Interpretation of seeing a brooch for a married woman: Seeing pins in a dream indicates the presence of problems and troubles, and removing them Of hair, clothes, or the veil means the collapse of problems and worries. Seeing pins on the bed indicates problems and disagreements, and picking them up from the bed indicates the cessation of worries and problems. A married woman sees that she is carrying a pin in a dream, this indicates pregnancy in the near future. Seeing fortune teller pins indicates many Among the problems and troubles that haunt the fortuneteller. Planting a pin in a man’s dream can indicate marital or family problems or work problems. Interpretation of seeing a pin for a pregnant woman. A pin in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a boy. A pin in a pregnant woman’s dream also indicates good health for her and her child. New. When a pin cuts off a pregnant woman’s hand or part of her body in a dream, it means that she and her child are in danger. Interpretation of seeing a pin in a dream: Seeing a married woman carrying a pin indicates an imminent pregnancy. And seeing that the pin is stuck in a noose, this indicates that her husband is harboring Its evil. Seeing a large number of pins on a woman's hand indicates a benefit that she will receive from a relative. The sting of a pin indicates that the fortuneteller is being lied to and deceived by a person. In cats, it also indicates worries and problems or people who cause him problems and problems. When seeing a needle Or tingling in the arm or body and yet you feel pain, this may indicate welcoming or hosting an unwanted person.

title: Interpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream

preview.html:
Interpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream: Many people dream of descending into the sea in their dreams, and many consider it a strange vision and sometimes they feel afraid because of this vision, and each case has a different interpretation from the other. Seeing the sea in a dream has many connotations for it. Every situation and every vision has many meanings and interpretations that we will explain in the following lines. You may also be interested in the following: Bathing in a dream The interpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream The interpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream The interpretation of seeing the sea descending on a man in his dream has many connotations and interpretations that we will explain in the following points: If A person sees in a dream that he is going down to the sea, then this is evidence of his imminent marriage and also indicates that he will obtain a lot of sustenance in the near future. And when he sees himself bathing in the sea, this is evidence of the proximity of relief to him, and if he is sick, this indicates his imminent recovery. And when He sees himself diving into the sea, then this is a sign that he will earn a lot of money soon, and if he sees himself drowning, then this is a sign of many problems that will soon be resolved for him. You may be interested: Pregnancy in a dreamInterpretation of seeing the sea descending in a dream for a lonely girlWhen she sees the sea in In a dream, a single girl feels strange in a dream. Therefore, we will explain some of the interpretations and connotations of seeing herself descending into the sea in the following points: If an unmarried girl sees herself descending into the sea, this indicates her good condition and the fulfillment of her dreams, and when she sees herself swimming, this indicates that she will marry a good man. When she sees herself drowning, This indicates that she has committed many sins and she must repent for them. title: Interpretation of a dream about entering an old apartment in a dream

It is one of the dreams that makes the dreamer feel very uncomfortable, but he wants to know an explanation for that, so we will learn about its interpretation in the following lines, which are the interpretations of some diligent scholars, not the established ones. on the site. They do not go into the interpretations, but they convey the interpretations of scholars. Interpretation of a dream of entering an old apartment in a dream: Anyone who dreams that he moved to an old house may indicate that changes have occurred in his life during that period. A dream of going to an old apartment with family in a dream may indicate the existence of a good relationship Among family members. Seeing yourself entering an old apartment in a dream may indicate upcoming happy events. Interpretation of a dream about a crow entering the house in a dream. Whoever dreams of a crow entering the house may indicate some bad thoughts that the dreamer is facing at that time. The crow entering the house may indicate In a dream, it indicates overcoming the difficulties that the dreamer faced in those days. Seeing a crow entering the house in a dream may mean that people are attacking him and that he will overcome them with the grace of God. Seeing a crow entering the house in a dream may indicate some health problems that the dreamer faces during this time, and God knows best. Entering the Prophet’s grave in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of desires and dreams in those days. If a person sees that he entered the Prophet’s grave, this may indicate his success and distinction in life. Life. Seeing him entering the Prophet’s grave in a dream may indicate some positive changes occurring in his life during this time, and God knows best. title: The most important interpretations of seeing a camel slaughtered in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Slaughtering a camel in a dream The camel is considered one of the animals that live in the desert, and it is famous for its strength and resistance to hardships and hot weather due to what it gains from the environment in which it lives. Does it have promising elements for the dreamer or do it have unpleasant meanings? We will learn the answer to this question in this article and touch on the most important interpretations of major jurists and commentators such as Ibn Sirin. Slaughtering a camel in a dream. We see in the interpretations of jurists that slaughtering a camel in a dream has different connotations. Scientists differed in their interpretation. Some of them see that it is good and others see that it could be a sign. On evil: Slaughtering a camel and eating it in a dream is a vision in which there is no harm and no resemblance to forbidden wealth. The interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a camel may indicate exhaustion and unhappiness at work. If the dreamer sees that he is slaughtering a camel in his dream and eating its head, then he is practicing backbiting and gossiping, and he must repent and ask forgiveness for this behavior. The bad. Whoever sees in his dream that he slaughters a camel and eats its raw meat, then usurps the rights of others and steals their money unjustly. Slaughtering a camel in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Ibn Sirin mentioned in the interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a camel undesirable signs, such as: Ibn Sirin sees in his interpretation a vision of a camel slaughtered in A dream may be a sign of a near death. As for seeing camel meat cooked after slaughtering it in a dream, this indicates the disappearance of worries and problems in the dreamer’s life. Ibn Sirin warns against interpreting a dream about slaughtering a camel, as it may indicate a serious illness. The dreamer who sees a camel in his dream Fleeing during the slaughter, he may be exposed to serious injustice in his life or work. Slaughtering a camel in a dream for unmarried women. What if a single woman dreamed of the desert ship massacre? Are the offers good or bad? Interpretation of dreams about slaughtering camels for a single woman studying is good news for excellence and reaching first place. If a girl sees that she is slaughtering a camel in a dream, this indicates a lot of blues and money coming. Watching the dreamer buy a camel in his dream with slaughter means that he will get Promotion at work. Slaughtering a camel in a dream for a married woman. In the context of discussing seeing a camel slaughtered in a dream, we refer to the married dreamer with the following connotations: Interpretation of a dream about slaughtering a camel for a married woman indicates her impatience and ability to bear her worries, problems, and heavy responsibility without her husband’s help. It is said: Seeing a wife Moving after slaughter is evidence of the presence of her haters and haters. But if a woman sees in her dream that her husband is slaughtering a camel, this is good news about the abundance of food, the luxury of life, and the provision of a decent life for her and her children. Slaughtering a camel in a dream for a pregnant woman. Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream may mean that she is slaughtering a camel from It may warn her of the deterioration of her health, as we see: Slaughtering a camel in a pregnant woman’s dream indicates the birth of a male child of great importance in the future. If a pregnant woman dreams of slaughtering a camel and eating raw meat, she may be exposed to serious health problems during pregnancy. While eating cooked camel meat After slaughtering in a pregnant woman’s sleep, it gives good news about pregnancy and easy childbirth without any problems. Slaughtering a camel in a dream for a divorced woman. We will refer to the interpreters’ most important interpretations of slaughtering a mountain in a dream.

title: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a guitar in a dream

preview.html: The guitar is considered one of the musical instruments that some people use to obtain calm music. It has a long shape that contains a group of strings that are used in a specific way to obtain various wonderful tones. The dream of a guitar has many interpretations that can be determined through our article. The guitar in a girl’s dream is different from seeing it. In a married dream, and also for a man, a married man has a special interpretation if he dreams of a guitar different from a single one. Interpretation of a dream about seeing a guitar in a dream for a man and seeing a guitar in a dream shows the fulfillment of desires and dreams, and in a man’s dream it shows marriage to a beautiful woman and a broken guitar shows the failure of relationships Emotional and broken engagement because it indicates marital problems. Interpretation of Ibn Sirin’s dream in a dream: Seeing yourself playing the guitar in a dream is a sign of a new love relationship. Seeing a stringed guitar is a sign of disappointment. Seeing a beautiful guitar in a man’s dream indicates the presence of a beautiful woman in his life. If you see a broken guitar in a dream, it means trouble. The guitar shows the good that is coming in the dreamer’s life. Playing the guitar in a dream indicates a change in the dreamer’s situation and life for the better. Buying a guitar in a dream indicates sadness. Hearing the guitar often It means hearing happy news. Playing the guitar is a sign of healing. See also: Interpretation of a dream about listening to songs in a dream for a manInterpretation of a dream about a guitar for a single woman: If a single girl in a dream hears the sound of a guitar, she will hear good news. If a single girl picks up a guitar in a dream If A man sees in a dream that he has started playing the guitar, then his affairs and circumstances will improve. If a man sees a woman playing the guitar, this is a sign that he is a man who likes to flirt with women. Seeing a man with a broken guitar is a sign of sadness and stress. Interpretation of a dream about a guitar for a married woman: Seeing a woman A married woman playing a guitar in a dream is a sign of a lot of love from someone. Seeing a guitar in a married man’s dream without strings is a sign of stress and sadness. See also: Interpretation of a dream about seeing a guitar in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about a guitar for a pregnant woman: Seeing a guitar for a pregnant woman in a dream is An indication of an easy birth. Seeing a broken guitar in a pregnant woman’s dream is a sign of some personal problems. A guitar in a pregnant woman’s dream is an indication of an imminent birth. Hearing a guitar in a dream means that some people are planning to harm him. Interpretation of a dream about playing the oud, Imam Ibn Sirin believes Seeing a player playing the oud in a dream is not a good omen for the dreamer. If he dreams that he is playing the oud and the string is plucked, this means that his worries will go away. Also, playing the oud in a dream indicates recovery from diseases. If he dreams

title: Interpretation of a dream about bruises on the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about bruises on the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin, which is one of the dreams that cause fear, panic and anxiety for the dreamer, especially since bruises are a sign of being hit or collided with something that led to the expression according to his social status, in addition to the circumstances that the fortune teller is going through and the events that he narrates according to what came in the dream, and it can be good news and it can be a sign of evil, and in our lives. We will shed light on the interpretation of a dream about bruises on the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about bruises on the thigh in a dream by Ibn Sirin Imam Ibn Sirin explained that seeing bruises on the body and thigh in a dream has many different connotations and hints, as this differs according to the social status of the seer, in addition to the facts that the seer says, and we show you that. The most important thing mentioned in this section: Imam Ibn Sirin believes that seeing bruises in a dream reveals something and reveals a secret to people, and it is possible that the signs that appear on the body in a dream indicate many differences, difficulties and problems in the dreamer's life. In addition to seeing bruises appear suddenly in a dream, this means that you are going through difficulties and conflicts. In addition to the appearance of colored spots on the body in a dream, this indicates the anxiety that afflicts the viewer after the ordeal, in addition to trying to hide the bruises in the dream, which is a sign of hiding what tires the dreamer. And God knows the unseen. See also: Interpretation of a dream in which someone tells you that you will die for unmarried, married or pregnant women Interpretation of seeing spots on the body in a dream In general, we find that seeing spots on the body in a dream is one of the unpleasant dreams, as it carries many interpretations and explanations related to the dreamer's life and can bring good signs according to the events that occur in the vision, and we have listed the most prominent interpretations, including: The appearance of spots on the body in a dream is indicated as a sign of lack of well-being in addition to loss of health, and some scholars have seen that the appearance of spots on the skin indicates the disclosure and disclosure of a secret. After all, seeing spots scattered all over the body in a dream indicates weakness and disastrous situations, and seeing white spots on the body indicates the strength and benefit that will surround the dreamer's life. While we find that seeing a red spot on the body in a dream indicates a serious illness, if there are blue spots on the body in a dream, this means being exposed to cruelty, beating and violence, and God knows the unseen. We explain to you what is related to seeing blue bruises in a dream, including: In general, seeing blue bruises in a dream is a sign of distress and distress, in addition to the appearance of many blue spots on the body, which indicates the dreamer's weakness and weakness in the difficulties and problems he faces in his life. While we find that getting rid of blue bruises in a dream is a sign
